sentences.simplifiedText: 安先生就住在那栋楼里。
sentences.traditionalText: 安先生就住在那棟樓裡。
sentences.pinyin: An xiānsheng jiù zhù zài nà dòng lóu lǐ.
sentences.translation: Mr. An lives in that building.

sentences.simplifiedText: 安先生是我们公司的新老板，他是从安家世代传下来的。
sentences.traditionalText: 安先生是我們公司的新老闆，他是從安家世代傳下來的。
sentences.pinyin: An xiānsheng shì wǒmen gōngsī de xīn lǎobǎn, tā shì cóng An jiā shìdài chuán xiàlái de.
sentences.translation: Mr. An is our company's new boss; he is from the An family line.

sentences.pinyin: zhè ge dì fāng hěn ān jìng.

sentences.simplifiedText: 即使在繁忙的城市中，他也能找到内心的安宁。
sentences.traditionalText: 即使在繁忙的城市中，他也能找到內心的安寧。
sentences.pinyin: jí shǐ zài fán máng de chéng shì zhōng, tā yě néng zhǎo dào nèi xīn de ān níng.
sentences.translation: Even in a busy city, he can find inner peace.

sentences.simplifiedText: 我喜欢在夜晚走在这个城市的街头，因为我觉得非常安全.
sentences.traditionalText: 我喜歡在夜晚走在這個城市的街頭，因為我覺得非常安全.
sentences.pinyin: Wǒ xǐhuān zài yèwǎn zǒu zài zhège chéngshì de jiētóu, yīnwèi wǒ juédé fēicháng ānquán.
sentences.translation: I like to walk in the streets of this city at night, because I feel very safe.

definitions.meaning: to place (sb) in a suitable position (job)

sentences.pinyin: Wǒ yào ān nǐ zài zhège wèizhì.
sentences.translation: I want to place you in this position.

sentences.simplifiedText: 尽管他刚来没多久，但是公司已经决定把他安在了重要的位置。
sentences.traditionalText: 儘管他剛來沒多久，但是公司已經決定把他安在了重要的位置。
sentences.pinyin: Jǐnguǎn tā gāng lái méi duōjiǔ, dànshì gōngsī yǐjīng juédìng bǎ tā ān zài le zhòngyào de wèizhì.
sentences.translation: Even though he hasn't been here long, the company has already decided to place him in an important position.

sentences.simplifiedText: 由于证据充足，法院决定对他提出正式控告。
sentences.traditionalText: 由於證據充足，法院決定對他提出正式控告。
sentences.pinyin: yóuyú zhèngjù chōngzú, fǎyuàn juédìng duì tā tíchū zhèngshì kònggào.
sentences.translation: Due to sufficient evidence, the court decided to formally charge him.
